{"templates": {"default": (25, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 0), size = (50, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (90, 0), size = (70, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (190, 0), size = (160, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (350, 0), size = (160, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (570, 0), size = (120, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (25, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 0), size = (50, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (90, 0), size = (70, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (190, 0), size = (160, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (350, 0), size = (160, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (570, 0), size = (120, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 25 }

screen.name: MessageBoxTemplate
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (int(textsize[0] * 1.1), int(textsize[1] * 1.1)) wsizex = textsize[0] + 73 wsizey = textsize[1] + 5 if 63 > wsizey: wsizey = 63 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: listlen = len(self.list) * 25 if listlen > 125: listlen = 125 wsizey += listlen + 10 elif 200 > wsizex: wsizex = 200 self.instance.resize(eSize(*(wsizex, wsizey))) if self.type == self.TYPE_MESSAGE: self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(31,0)) elif 50 > textsize[1]: self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(68,14)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, wsizey-listlen-10)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*(wsizex-20, listlen))) self.instance.move(ePoint((1280-wsizex)//2, (720-wsizey+30)//2))

eLabel.text: Return the Love Event (only for genuine box)
